pkgmetadata.longdescription: # bulk-taskPackage bulk-task provide an easy way to call lazy functions in bulk.## Installation```$ pip install bulk-task```## Example```pythonfrom dataclasses import dataclassfrom bulk_task import BulkTaskbulk_task = BulkTask()# It can be a dataclass or a Pydantic model.@dataclassclass DataclassModel: name: str@bulk_taskdef func(args: List[DataclassModel]): print(arg.name for arg in args)# Push lazy calls.func.push('name1')func.push('name2')# Bulk consume lazy calls.bulk_task.consume()```
